text: Oppenheimer was a 2015 play on the life of J. Robert Oppenheimer by the British writer Tom Morton-Smith. It premiered with the Royal Shakespeare Company in Stratford-upon-Avon from 15 January to 7 March 2015, transferring to the Vaudeville Theatre in London from 27 March to 23 May \- Oppenheimer was played by John Heffernan. ==References== Category:2015 plays Category:Plays about World War II Category:Plays based on real people Category:Biographical plays about scientists Category:Cultural depictions of J.
